title: THE CRAZIEST KEYBOARD EVER
description: Video you might have missed -   Optimus Popularis Keyboard -   This is the craziest keyboard I've ever seen. Beneath each clear key of the Optimus Popularis is a customizable display. This is like a million keyboards in one!  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
